About Hardees Hardees is a Fast Food restaurant located at 100 Plaza Dr in Park Hills, MO . Hardees has been described as an Mediocre Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 3 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Burgers, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
